instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: Well then, have you returned with the lapis?

insert.response: Do you have another quest for me?

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: Ah, so you have yet to accomplish this task I see.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: Did you just lie to me? Or did you just put them down somewhere and forget?

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: Regardless, I am still counting on you dear, Complete this task for me and I will make you my apprentice!

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: Please return when you have the lapis.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: Ah, splendid! I knew you had it in you!

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: So in addition to what we agreed upon, I also have a little something extra for you. Hold out your hand, love.

instances.speaker: mcrpg:felina
instances.text: So, as I have promised I will now take you under my wing. I will teach you spells in exchange for some of your experience.
